column2: "All things considered, there's really nobody here, is there?"

"Apparently, everyone moved out of here around the
same time that the experiments on Halpha began."
"The city's functions have been offline for a long time."

"However, it seems like our mere arrival has caused
a portion of those functions to boot back up."
"And that's why enemies have started appearing?"
"It appears to be a defense system for dealing with intruders."
"I can also see errors in some of the training programs."
"Is there a way to stop the enemies?"
"Why didn't Zephetto shut them down?"
"The governor... I mean, Zephetto has administrative access, I believe."
"As to why he didn't suspend defense protocols... I don't know."
"I don't know."
"But I believe the governor... I mean, Zephetto has administrative access."
"Do you know how long this place was being used?"
"No, I wasn't given that information..."
"With a city of this scale, I can't imagine everyone moved to Halpha or Leciel."
"...I lack the details regarding that as well."

"As I figured, he's intent on keeping secret
any information that's \"inconvenient\" to him."
"Why don't we try asking Zephetto himself?"
"We should be able to meet him soon, right?"
"You're right. Let's keep moving."
